sqlMap.select:
SELECT id as "id", count_day as "countDay", ware_house_no as "wareHouseNo", ware_house_name as "wareHouseName", storage_no as "storageNo", stack_no as "stackNo", mat_type_num as "matTypeNum", mat_type_name as "matTypeName", mat_num as "matNum", mat_name as "matName", mat_model as "matModel", mat_spec as "matSpec", unit as "unit", unit_name as "unitName", price as "price", first_num as "firstNum", first_amount as "firstAmount", last_num as "lastNum", last_amount as "lastAmount", enter_num as "enterNum", enter_amount as "enterAmount", transfer_enter_num as "transferEnterNum", transfer_enter_amount as "transferEnterAmount", out_num as "outNum", out_amount as "outAmount", transfer_out_num as "transferOutNum", transfer_out_amount as "transferOutAmount", rec_creator as "recCreator", rec_create_time as "recCreateTime", rec_revisor as "recRevisor", rec_revise_time as "recReviseTime", data_group_code as "dataGroupCode", archive_flag as "archiveFlag" FROM si_day_storage WHERE 1=1
id = #id#
count_day = #countDay#
ware_house_no = #wareHouseNo#
mat_type_name like concat('%', #matTypeName#, '%')
mat_num like concat('%', #matNum#, '%')
mat_num = #matNumEQ#
mat_name like concat('%', #matName#, '%')
count_day >= #beginTime#
count_day <= #endTime#
$orderBy$
count_day,ware_house_no,mat_num asc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM .si_day_storage WHERE 1=1
id = #id#
count_day = #countDay#
ware_house_no = #wareHouseNo#
mat_type_name like concat('%', #matTypeName#, '%')
mat_num like concat('%', #matNum#, '%')
mat_num = #matNumEQ#
mat_name like concat('%', #matName#, '%')
count_day >= #beginTime#
count_day <= #endTime#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO si_day_storage ( id, count_day, ware_house_no, ware_house_name, storage_no, stack_no, mat_type_num, mat_type_name, mat_num, mat_name, mat_model, mat_spec, unit, unit_name, price, first_num, first_amount, last_num, last_amount, enter_num, enter_amount, transfer_enter_num, transfer_enter_amount, out_num, out_amount, transfer_out_num, transfer_out_amount, rec_creator, rec_create_time, rec_revisor, rec_revise_time, data_group_code, archive_flag ) VALUES
( #list[].id#, #list[].countDay#, #list[].wareHouseNo#, #list[].wareHouseName#, #list[].storageNo#, #list[].stackNo#, #list[].matTypeNum#, #list[].matTypeName#, #list[].matNum#, #list[].matName#, #list[].matModel#, #list[].matSpec#, #list[].unit#, #list[].unitName#, #list[].price#, #list[].firstNum#, #list[].firstAmount#, #list[].lastNum#, #list[].lastAmount#, #list[].enterNum#, #list[].enterAmount#, #list[].transferEnterNum#, #list[].transferEnterAmount#, #list[].outNum#, #list[].outAmount#, #list[].transferOutNum#, #list[].transferOutAmount#, #list[].recCreator#, #list[].recCreateTime#, #list[].recRevisor#, #list[].recReviseTime#, #list[].dataGroupCode#, #list[].archiveFlag# )
sqlMap.select:
select if(sum(first_num) is null,0,sum(first_num)) firstNum, if(sum(first_amount) is null,0,sum(first_amount)) firstAmount, if(sum(last_num) is null,0,sum(last_num)) lastNum, if(sum(last_amount) is null,0,sum(last_amount)) lastAmount FROM si_day_storage WHERE 1=1
id = #id#
count_day = #countDay#
ware_house_no = #wareHouseNo#
mat_type_name like concat('%', #matTypeName#, '%')
mat_num like concat('%', #matNum#, '%')
mat_num = #matNumEQ#
mat_name like concat('%', #matName#, '%')
count_day >= #beginTime#
count_day <= #endTime#

SELECT count_day as "countDay", ware_house_name as "wareHouseName", mat_num as "matNum", mat_name as "matName", mat_spec as "matSpec", mat_model as "matModel", mat_type_name as "matTypeName", unit_name as "unitName", price as "price", first_num as "firstNum", first_amount as "firstAmount", last_num as "lastNum", last_amount as "lastAmount", enter_num as "enterNum", enter_amount as "enterAmount", transfer_enter_num as "transferEnterNum", transfer_enter_amount as "transferEnterAmount", out_num as "outNum", out_amount as "outAmount", transfer_out_num as "transferOutNum", transfer_out_amount as "transferOutAmount" FROM si_day_storage WHERE 1=1
id = #id#
count_day = #countDay#
ware_house_no = #wareHouseNo#
mat_type_name like concat('%', #matTypeName#, '%')
mat_num like concat('%', #matNum#, '%')
mat_num = #matNumEQ#
mat_name like concat('%', #matName#, '%')
count_day >= #beginTime#
count_day <= #endTime#
$orderBy$
count_day,ware_house_no,mat_num asc
